data.message: I hate the jingle at the end of the advert now it’s just ruined a lot of Christmas memories for me especially. I can’t recall the Santa winking but with this many people commenting on it surely it actually happened not this many people can be wrong. Coca Cola you have spoiled a great Christmas advert there was nothing wrong with it the way it was. I vote that you change it back to the way it was if your brave enough why don’t you open a poll and let the people vote and if there’s enough votes you change it back????
